name: Wekan Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Wekan Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Wekan API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Wekan API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: card

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new list
Get (值: get) - Get the data of a list
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many board lists

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the list | (必填项)

owner.name: owner
owner.description: The user ID in Wekan. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Owner Name or ID | 作用: The user ID in Wekan. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignees (值: None) - The new list of assignee IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
description (值: None) - The new description of the card
members (值: None) - The new list of member IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

boardId.name: boardId
boardId.description: ID of the board where the lists are in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
boardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Board Name or ID | 作用: ID of the board where the lists are in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

IdUser.name: IdUser
IdUser.description: The ID of the user that boards are attached. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
IdUser.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the user that boards are attached. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The ID of the list to get
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: The ID of the list to get | (必填项)

swimlaneId.name: swimlaneId
swimlaneId.description: The ID of the swimlane that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
swimlaneId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Swimlane Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the swimlane that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

authorId.name: authorId
authorId.description: The user who posted the comment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
authorId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Author Name or ID | 作用: The user who posted the comment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

cardId.name: cardId
cardId.description: The ID of the card that checklistItem belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
cardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Card Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the card that checklistItem belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

fromObject.name: fromObject
fromObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Object | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: title (值: None) - The new title for the checklistItem item
isFinished (值: None) - Whether the item is checked

comment.name: comment
comment.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment | 作用: The comment text | (必填项)

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.description: The ID of the comment to get
commentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | 作用: The ID of the comment to get | (必填项)

items.name: items
items.description: Items to be added to the checklist
items.natural_language_description: 参数名: Items | 作用: Items to be added to the checklist | 默认值: []

checklistId.name: checklistId
checklistId.description: The ID of the checklistItem that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
checklistId.natural_language_description: 参数名: CheckList Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the checklistItem that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

checklistItemId.name: checklistItemId
checklistItemId.description: The ID of the checklistItem item to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
checklistItemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Checklist Item Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the checklistItem item to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
